name: getCustomFieldContextsForProjectsAndIssueTypes
description:
Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of project and issue type mappings and, for each mapping, the ID of a [custom field context](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/k44fOw) that applies to the project and issue type.

If there is no custom field context assigned to the project then, if present, the custom field context that applies to all projects is returned if it also applies to the issue type or all issue types. If a custom field context is not found, the returned custom field context ID is `null`.

Duplicate project and issue type mappings cannot be provided in the request.

The order of the returned values is the same as provided in the request.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

fieldId.description: The ID of the custom field.

startAt.description: The index of the first item to return in a page of results (page offset).

maxResults.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

body.description: The list of project and issue type mappings.

$ul: **isLast**: Whether this is the last page.
**maxResults**: The maximum number of items that could be returned.
**nextPage**: If there is another page of results, the URL of the next page.
**startAt**: The index of the first item returned.
